summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, dated April 6, 2011. The email contains a congratulatory message and includes a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be attorney-client privileged. The communication emphasizes the confidential nature of the content and prohibits unauthorized use or disclosure.
